thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lewis Group Granted Approval For Acquisition Of United Furniture Outlets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lewis Group Granted Approval For Acquisition Of United Furniture Outlets

organizations.name: brief-lewis group granted approval for acquisition of united furniture outlets

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Lewis Group Ltd:
* ‍COMPETITION AUTHORITIES YESTERDAY GRANTED APPROVAL FOR ACQUISITION OF UNITED FURNITURE OUTLETS PROPRIETARY LIMITED​
* ‍ACQUISITION WILL BE ACCOUNTED FOR BY LEWIS WITH EFFECT FROM 1 FEBRUARY 2018​
* ‍ALL CONDITIONS PRECEDENT TO ACQUISITION HAVE NOW BEEN MET AND ACQUISITION IS ACCORDINGLY UNCONDITIONAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
